Package parkingRobot

Interface IControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlRST
    public interface IControl
    interface for the main module 'Control', providing methods for executing the algorithms to control the robot according to different modes which is set by guidance.
    Author:
    Konstantin Wrede

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  IControl.ControlMode
      control modes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void exec_CTRL_ALGO()
      execute the selected control algorithm which was set by guidance
      IControl.ControlMode getCtrlMode()
      get the current control mode
      void setAngularVelocity​(double angularVelocity)
      set the required angular velocity
      void setCtrlMode​(IControl.ControlMode ctrl_mode)
      set the current control mode
      void setDestination​(double heading, double x, double y)
      set the destination to be driven to
      void setDriveFor​(double x, double y, double phi, double v, double w, lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose startPose)
      set RELATIVE destination and velocities before entering setpose-mode
      void setParkingFor​(lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose startPose, lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose endPose)
      set destination and calculate trajectory coefficients before parking-mode
      void setPose​(lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose currentPosition)
      the Robot's current position
      void setStartTime​(int startTime)
      set start time
      void setVelocity​(double velocity)
      set the required speed

    • Method Detail

      • setVelocity

        void setVelocity​(double velocity)
        set the required speed
        Parameters:
        velocity - setting the translatory velocity for all control sequences

      • setAngularVelocity

        void setAngularVelocity​(double angularVelocity)
        set the required angular velocity
        Parameters:
        angularVelocity - setting the angular velocity for all control sequences

      • setDestination

        void setDestination​(double heading,
                    double x,
                    double y)
        set the destination to be driven to
        Parameters:
        heading - the heading angle of the robot at the destination
        x - the destination position in x axis
        y - the destination position in y axis

      • setPose

        void setPose​(lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose currentPosition)
        the Robot's current position
        Parameters:
        currentPosition - the current position of the robot at each sampling

      • setDriveFor

        void setDriveFor​(double x,
                 double y,
                 double phi,
                 double v,
                 double w,
                 lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose startPose)
        set RELATIVE destination and velocities before entering setpose-mode
        Parameters:
        x - the destination position on x-axis in m
        y - the destination position on y-axis in m
        phi - the heading angle of the robot at the destination in rad
        v - translatory velocity in cm/s
        w - angular velocity in rad/s
        startPose - latest measured pose to start trajectory

      • setParkingFor

        void setParkingFor​(lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose startPose,
                   lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose endPose)
        set destination and calculate trajectory coefficients before parking-mode
        Parameters:
        startPose - start pose of the trajectory
        endPose - finishing pose of the trajectory

      • setCtrlMode

        void setCtrlMode​(IControl.ControlMode ctrl_mode)
        set the current control mode
        Parameters:
        ctrl_mode - parameter for control mode which is defined by Guidance

      • getCtrlMode

        IControl.ControlMode getCtrlMode()
        get the current control mode
        Returns:
        current ctrl_mode

      • setStartTime

        void setStartTime​(int startTime)
        set start time
        Parameters:
        startTime - start time

      • exec_CTRL_ALGO

        void exec_CTRL_ALGO()
        execute the selected control algorithm which was set by guidance
